org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.camera

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.camera.View

  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    View object for storing players location on the map and the vectors of the direction in which they are looking.

    View values are backed by GeomVector2D

    Since:
    2018-12-10, v0.2
    Version:
    v0.4
    Author:
    Alex Kalinins

    • Constructor Detail

      • View

        public View(float xPos,
            float yPos,
            float xDir,
            float yDir,
            float xPlane,
            float yPlane)
        Constructor for View Object
        Parameters:
        xPos - x-location of a player on the map
        yPos - y-location of a player on the map
        xDir - x component of vector for direction of the camera
        yDir - y component of vector for direction of the camera
        xPlane - x plane of vector
        yPlane - y plane of vector (a control of FOV)

      • View

        public View(GeomVector2D<java.lang.Float> pos,
            GeomVector2D<java.lang.Float> dir,
            GeomVector2D<java.lang.Float> plane)
        Constructor using GeomVector2D objects
        Parameters:
        pos - position vector - players position on the map
        dir - direction vector - the direction in which the player is looking
        plane - plane vector - the camera plane, everything the camera sees.

    • Method Detail

      • updateView

        public void updateView(float xPos,
                       float yPos,
                       float xDir,
                       float yDir,
                       float xPlane,
                       float yPlane)
        Updates View object. Used if multiple values need to be changed at once.
        Parameters:
        xPos - x-location of a player on the map
        yPos - y-location of a player on the map
        xDir - x component of vector for direction of the camera
        yDir - y component of vector for direction of the camera
        xPlane - x plane of vector
        yPlane - y plane of vector
